name: Escape from Arcadia
description:
You are a prisoner who broke out of  jail and stole a rocket. You must now escape the city of Arcadia by avoiding collisions with other obstacles. Navigate your rocket from the blue launch pad to the green landing pad. If you collide with an obstacle you will lose a life. Lose all your lives and it's game over. Will you escape from Arcadia?

Controls

Space Bar - Trust / Boost

A - Rotate Counter Clockwise

B- Rotate Clockwise

Esc key - Pause Game
